# 云米科技有限公司 Research Report

## Company Overview

### Core Product/Service  
* AI-powered appliances including AI净水器, AI空调, AI大屏冰箱, AI洗衣机, AI热水器  
* 全屋智能解决方案 integrating smart kitchen, bathroom, living room, and bedroom devices  
* 5G-enabled IoT@Home platform supporting 200+ connected devices  
* Proprietary Vio-Brain AI system for cross-device automation  
* AI昆仑矿泉净水机 with mineral water purification technology  

### Leadership Team  
* 陈小平 - Founder, Chairman & CEO; former VP at Midea Group (15 years experience)  
* Jinling Zhang - Independent Director; former VP at Baidu Group  
* Weijiang Wu - Independent Director; VP at Zhejiang Youpon Integrated Ceiling  
* 刘德 - Director; Co-founder & Senior VP at Xiaomi  

### Target Market  
* Chinese urban middle-class households (26-38岁新中产)  
* Smart home early adopters seeking interconnected appliances  
* Property developers integrating smart home solutions  
* Verified customers: Xiaomi (43.3% of 2021 revenue), JD.com, Suning  
* Use cases: Smart kitchens with fridge-to-oven automation, water quality monitoring via AI净水器  

### Key Differentiators  
* First to market with 全屋互联网家电 concept (2016)  
* 5G模组 technology enabling large-scale device connectivity  
* F2C新零售 model eliminating distribution markups  
* 3511战略 focusing on rapid product iteration and ecosystem expansion  
* AI Helpful 2.0 system for proactive appliance automation  

### Business Model  
* Premium pricing for AI appliances (e.g. 20,000-50,000 RMB smart kitchen sets)  
* Recurring revenue from filter replacements (5% of 2021 revenue)  
* Dual distribution: Xiaomi channels (43.3%) +自有品牌 channels (56.7%)  
* 1,500+ offline experience stores + JD/Tmall online platforms  
* SaaS model with paid IoT增值服务 in development  

## Industry Overview

### Market Overview  
* 云米科技有限公司 operates in the 智能家电制造 market segment, specializing in IoT-enabled smart home appliances.  
* The Chinese smart home appliance market size reached 282.8 billion yuan in 2017.  
* The market grew at a CAGR of 22.2% from 2017 to 2020.  

### Direct Competition  
* Direct competitors include 美的集团, 海尔智家, 小米集团, and 华为.  
* Competing products include smart water purifiers, internet refrigerators, range hoods, and gas stoves.  
* 云米 holds a leading position in the smart water purifier segment but trails behind traditional giants like 美的 and 海尔 in broader smart home categories.  

### Competitive Advantages  
* Unique technical features include AI-powered voice, facial, and gesture recognition technologies integrated into smart appliances.  
* Proven advantages include rapid product line expansion from water purifiers to full-house smart appliances and over 1,000 offline experience stores.  

### Market Challenges  
* High dependency on Xiaomi for sales, with 43.3% of revenue tied to Xiaomi as of 2021.  
* Intense competition from established家电巨头 like 美的 and 海尔, which dominate market share in key categories.  
* Low online market share for自主品牌 products, with most categories below 1% in 2022.  
* Declining profitability in core segments like smart kitchen appliances, with毛利率 27.46% vs. competitors' 40-50%.  

## Financial Overview

### Funding & Investment  
* Total funding amount: Approximately $30 million (as of 2018)  
* Funding rounds:  
  * Angel Round (July 2014): $5 million from Xiaomi Group  
  * Series A (January 2015): $25 million from GIC Singapore, Sequoia Capital China, Shunwei Capital, and 5Y Capital (formerly Morningside Venture Capital)  

### Revenue Model  
* Primary revenue streams:  
  * IoT-enabled smart home products (e.g., smart refrigerators, dishwashers, air conditioners)  
  * Smart water purification systems (flagship product: Xiaomi-branded water purifiers)  
  * Consumables and value-added services  
* Pricing strategy:  
  * Xiaomi-branded products: Competitive pricing (e.g., Xiaomi water purifiers at ~¥1,000-2,000)  
  * Self-branded products: Premium pricing (e.g., Viomi smart refrigerators at ¥3,000-8,000)  
* Sales channels:  
  * Xiaomi ecosystem (contributing ~54% of 2018H1 revenue)  
  * Direct online sales (JD.com, Tmall, proprietary app)  
  * Offline experience stores (1,000+ stores as of 2018)  

## News

* Viomi Technology Co., Ltd announced a special dividend of US$0.088 per ADS, payable on August 21, 2025, to shareholders of record as of July 31, 2025.  
* Viomi unveiled the Kunlun 4 Pro Alkaline Mineral Water Purifier and Vortex 8 at CES 2025, featuring advanced RO filtration and mineral-enhancing technologies.  
* Viomi collaborated with AIVIN Holdings to integrate advanced AI technology into its Kunlun 4 Pro Alkaline Mineral Water Purifier.  
* Viomi's Vortex 8 and Kunlun Mineral Water Purifier received significant consumer acclaim after their CES 2025 showcase, with strong pre-order performance on Kickstarter and Amazon.  
* Viomi was granted an exception by Nasdaq Staff regarding the delayed filing of its Form 20-F, allowing until November 11, 2025, to regain compliance.  

## References

* Viomi Technology Co., Ltd. Annual Report 2021.  
* China Smart Home Appliance Market Report 2017-2020.  
* Nasdaq Filings and Announcements for Viomi Technology Co., Ltd.  
* CES 2025 Product Showcase and Reviews.
